column4: is there anyone whos ever trudged through the muck with the ipod audiobook m4b format?

stupid ipods wont sort files into the audiobook menu if they are mp3s only audible .aa files and ipod .m4b files, so unless i want to litter my audiobooks all over my music, i have to convert ALL these mp3s into .m4bs which are actually like twice as big...wtf
use an ipod management tool... apt-cache search ipod
how i have gtkpod, but i cant figure exactly how that helps
